languages.text: "Арбитес никогда не признают этого еретика законным правителем. Если он появится на Даргонусе, мы немедленно скрутим предателя и доставим к вам".
"The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес никогда не признают этого еретика законным правителем. Если он появится на Даргонусе, мы немедленно скрутим предателя и доставим к вам".

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will put the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."
"The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will put the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."
"The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."
"The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."
"The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."
"The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

languages.text: “法务部绝对不会承认那个异端分子是合法的统治者。如果他胆敢在达戈努斯露面，我们会立刻把那个叛徒铐起来，押到你面前。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

traits.locale_text: “法务部绝对不会承认那个异端分子是合法的统治者。如果他胆敢在达戈努斯露面，我们会立刻把那个叛徒铐起来，押到你面前。”

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites nunca reconocerá a ese hereje como gobernador legítimo. Si vuelve a aparecer por Dargonus, encadenaremos al traidor y se lo entregaremos de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites nunca reconocerá a ese hereje como gobernador legítimo. Si vuelve a aparecer por Dargonus, encadenaremos al traidor y se lo entregaremos de inmediato».

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites ne considérera jamais cet hérétique comme un dirigeant légitime. S'il s'avise de se présenter sur Dargonus, nous nous efforcerons de le capturer immédiatement afin de vous le livrer. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites ne considérera jamais cet hérétique comme un dirigeant légitime. S'il s'avise de se présenter sur Dargonus, nous nous efforcerons de le capturer immédiatement afin de vous le livrer. »

languages.text: 「高等裁定局があの異端者を正当な支配者として認めることは決してありません。もしあの裏切り者がダルゴナスに姿を現せば、我々は即座に拘束し、あなたのもとへ引き渡します」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局があの異端者を正当な支配者として認めることは決してありません。もしあの裏切り者がダルゴナスに姿を現せば、我々は即座に拘束し、あなたのもとへ引き渡します」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites, o kâfiri asla meşru hükümdar olarak tanımayacaktır. Dargonus'a adım atacak olursa haini zincire vurup hemen size teslim edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites, o kâfiri asla meşru hükümdar olarak tanımayacaktır. Dargonus'a adım atacak olursa haini zincire vurup hemen size teslim edeceğiz."

languages.text: "Die Adeptus Arbites werden diesen Ketzer niemals als rechtmäßigen Herrscher akzeptieren. Sollte er sein Gesicht auf Dargonus zeigen, werden wir den Verräter sofort in Ketten legen und ihn an Euch ausliefern."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites will never recognise that heretic as a rightful ruler. If he shows his face on Dargonus, we will place the traitor in chains immediately and deliver him to you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Adeptus Arbites werden diesen Ketzer niemals als rechtmäßigen Herrscher akzeptieren. Sollte er sein Gesicht auf Dargonus zeigen, werden wir den Verräter sofort in Ketten legen und ihn an Euch ausliefern."
